alert.note: Alert for Phillips County; Sedgwick County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Phillips and south central Sedgwick Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 644 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Paoli, or 9 miles northwest of Holyoke, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Holyoke, Haxtun, Paoli and Fairfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
